definitions.definition: Senses relating to a thin, pointed object.

subdefinitions.definition: A sharp stick used for writing on clay tablets or other surfaces ; a stylus ; ( by extension , obsolete ) an instrument used to write with ink ; a pen .
A tool with a sharp point used in engraving ; a burin , a graver , a stylet , a stylus.
The gnomon or pin of a sundial , the shadow of which indicates the hour .
The stalk that connects the stigma (s) to the ovary in a pistil of a flower .
A kind of surgical instrument with a blunt point, used for exploration .
A small, thin , pointed body part . ( entomology ) A long , slender , bristle -like process near the anal region .

definitions.definition: A particular manner of expression in writing or speech , especially one regarded as good .

subdefinitions.definition: A legal or traditional term or formula of words used to address or refer to a person, especially a monarch or a person holding a post or having a title .
examples: Monarchs are often addressed with the style of Majesty.
The villagers styled him as my Liege , and this style , once established, was seldom forgone.

definitions.definition: A particular manner of creating , doing , or presenting something, especially a work of architecture or art .

subdefinitions.definition: A particular manner of acting or behaving ; ( specifically ) one regarded as fashionable or skilful ; flair , grace .
examples: As a dancer, he has a lot of style .
Backstabbing people is not my style .

subdefinitions.definition: A particular way in which one grooms , adorns , dresses , or carries oneself; ( specifically ) a way thought to be attractive or fashionable.
A visual or other modification to text or other elements of a document , such as boldface or italics .
examples: applying styles to text in a wordprocessor  Cascading Style Sheets

subdefinitions.definition: A set of rules regarding the presentation of text ( spelling , typography , the citation of references , etc.) and illustrations that is applied by a publisher to the works it produces .
examples: the house style of the journal

main_definition: Senses relating to a thin, pointed object.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension from sense 1.1 ) A particular manner of expression in writing or speech , especially one regarded as good .
A particular manner of creating , doing , or presenting something, especially a work of architecture or art .
